ch0144_00_lance/0101_0701_01_10:
I won’t let anyone interfere with our
activities, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0144_00_lance/0101_0701_02_10: I advise you to be very afraid of what’s to come!
ch0144_00_lance/7101_0701_01_10: We will always be Giovanni’s loyal subordinates.
ch0144_00_lance/7101_0701_02_10: Even if he leaves Team Rocket!
ch0144_00_lance/7102_0701_01_10: The grunts are digging a well on Pasio.
ch0144_00_lance/7102_0701_02_10:
They plan to raise Slowpoke inside it and sell their
tails for a tidy sum.
ch0144_00_lance/7102_0701_03_10: But it’s taking far too much time...
ch0144_00_lance/7103_0701_01_10:
Pokémon are tools for making money. That applies
to my partner Pokémon, too.
ch0144_00_lance/7103_0701_02_10: Oh? It seems to really like me?
ch0144_00_lance/7103_0701_03_10:
Well, that’s no surprise. We build trust as we
work together.
ch0144_00_lance/7104_0701_01_10:
It seems that many organizations have come
to Pasio.
ch0144_00_lance/7104_0701_02_10:
But there isn’t any organization that could possibly
surpass Team Rocket!
ch0144_00_lance/7104_0701_03_10:
I’ll show you just who the scariest and cruelest
guy is!
ch0144_00_lance/7105_0701_01_10:
No matter what you say, I’m not afraid to
admit that I love Team Rocket from the bottom 
of my heart.
ch0144_00_lance/7105_0701_02_10:
We are destined to be enemies,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0144_00_lance/7105_0701_03_10: When we clash, don’t hold back.
ch0144_00_lance/1701_0701_02_10: Allow me to give you a present!
ch0144_00_lance/1701_0702_01_10: Heh... This is just part of my plan.
ch0144_00_lance/2501_0701_01_10:
We’ve successfully recruited some sync pairs as
temporary Team Rocket members.
ch0144_00_lance/2501_0701_02_10:
It seems Giovanni and Team Rocket’s
reputation has sufficiently permeated Pasio!
ch0144_00_lance/2501_0701_03_10:
With all these members, we could easily take
control of this island!
ch0144_00_lance/2501_0702_02_10:
If you plan on interfering, go ahead. Let’s see
your futile attempt!
ch0144_00_lance/2511_0701_01_10: I made a grave mistake once...
ch0144_00_lance/2511_0701_02_10:
I underestimated someone because they were a
kid, and I let them go without realizing they’d be
a threat to Team Rocket.
ch0144_00_lance/2511_0701_03_10:
Which is even more reason to keep an eye
on you—no matter what!
ch0144_00_lance/2511_0702_02_10:
If only I had put everything I had into
destroying that kid, there wouldn’t have
been this much sabotage!
ch0144_00_lance/2511_0702_03_10: It was the biggest failure of my life!
ch0144_00_lance/3001_0701_01_10:
There’s a lot to do today. We don’t have time to
waste on dillydallying.
ch0144_00_lance/3003_0701_01_10:
So you’re off on another adventure with your
precious Pokémon... Good luck, I suppose.
ch0144_00_lance/3005_0701_01_10:
The sun has finally set. Now we can really get
to work.
